# proof

```
$ echo "Hello World" > temp/hello.txt
```

```
$ ./scripts/create-signature.sh temp/hello.txt | json_pp
{
   "timestamp" : "2017-08-20T19:50:53Z",
   "hash" : "e1c112ff908febc3b98b1693a6cd3564eaf8e5e6ca629d084d9f0eba99247cacdd72e369ff8941397c2807409ff66be64be908da17ad7b8a49a2a26c0e8086aa  temp/hello.txt",
   "publicKey" : "",
   "signature" : ""
}
```

```
$ ./scripts/lookup-signature.sh temp/hello.txt | json_pp
[
   {
      "publicKey" : "",
      "signature" : "",
      "timestamp" : "2017-08-20T19:50:53Z",
      "hash" : "e1c112ff908febc3b98b1693a6cd3564eaf8e5e6ca629d084d9f0eba99247cacdd72e369ff8941397c2807409ff66be64be908da17ad7b8a49a2a26c0e8086aa  temp/hello.txt"
   }
]
```

```
$ ./scripts/verify-signature.sh temp/hello.txt
Current hash: e1c112ff908febc3b98b1693a6cd3564eaf8e5e6ca629d084d9f0eba99247cacdd72e369ff8941397c2807409ff66be64be908da17ad7b8a49a2a26c0e8086aa temp/hello.txt
Signed hash: e1c112ff908febc3b98b1693a6cd3564eaf8e5e6ca629d084d9f0eba99247cacdd72e369ff8941397c2807409ff66be64be908da17ad7b8a49a2a26c0e8086aa temp/hello.txt
Current public key: 
Signature public key: 
{"signatureValid":true}
```
